code: import React from'react';import'./buttonGroup.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ButtonGroup=_ref=>{let{next,previous,goToSlide,...rest}=_ref;const{carouselState:{currentSlide,totalItems,slidesToShow}}=rest;const isEnd=currentSlide===totalItems-slidesToShow;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"carousel-button-group container",style:{position:'absolute',bottom:'10px',right:'10px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"custom-left-arrow",onClick:()=>{if(currentSlide===0){next();}else{previous();}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-solid fa-angle-left"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"custom-right-arrow",onClick:()=>{if(isEnd){previous();}else{next();}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-solid fa-angle-right"})})]});};export default ButtonGroup;
